item.title: 'Youngjin' is one of more than 300 Korean workers who were detained in the US earlier this month. US officials initially claimed the workers had been in the country illegally on incorrect visas, but allowed them to leave voluntarily without any penalties.
item.description: 'Youngjin' is one of more than 300 Korean workers who were detained in the US earlier this month. US officials initially claimed the workers had been in the country illegally on incorrect visas, but allowed them to leave voluntarily without any penalties.

item.title: Police used tear gas and water cannons to disperse violent anti-immigration protesters in The Hague on Saturday. Prime Minister Dick Schoof condemned the "shocking and bizarre images of shameless violence", saying it was "completely unacceptable". #TheHag
